verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> when they had passed <S%G1353>through<s%> <S%G295>Amphipolis<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G624>Apollonia,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> Jews: <S%G2453><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> as his manner <S%G2596>was,<s%> <S%G1486><s%> went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>days<s%> <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%>

Opening <S%G1272><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3908>alleging,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> must <S%G1163>needs<s%> have <S%G3958>suffered,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> risen <S%G450>again<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2605>preach<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3982>believed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> consorted <S%G4345>with<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4576>devout<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>chief<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3641>few.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> which believed <S%G544>not,<s%> moved with <S%G2206>envy,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G4355>unto<s%> them <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4190>lewd<s%> <S%G435>fellows<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> baser <S%G60>sort,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> gathered a <S%G3792>company,<s%> and set all the city on an <S%G2350>uproar,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2186>assaulted<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G2394>Jason,<s%> and <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G846>to<s%> bring them <S%G71>out<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1218>people.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> they <S%G4951>drew<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> rulers of the <S%G4173>city,<s%> <S%G994>crying,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> that have turned the world upside <S%G387>down<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3625><s%> are <S%G3918>come<s%> <S%G1759>hither<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> hath <S%G5264>received:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G561>contrary<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1378>decrees<s%> of <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that there <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> one <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G5015>troubled<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> rulers of the <S%G4173>city,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G2425>security<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2394>Jason,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3062>other,<s%> they let them <S%G630>go.<s%> <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> sent <S%G1599>away<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G960>Berea:<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3854>coming<s%> thither <S%G549>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> more <S%G2104>noble<s%> than <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica,<s%> in that <S%G3748>they<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> readiness of <S%G4288>mind,<s%> and <S%G350>searched<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> <S%G2596>daily,<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> those <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G3779>so.<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4100>believed;<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2158>honorable<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> which were <S%G1674>Greeks,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3641>few.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%> had <S%G1097>knowledge<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G2605>preached<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G960>Berea,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> thither <S%G2546>also,<s%> and stirred <S%G4531>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> sent <S%G1821>away<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G5278>abode<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> still.

And <S%G1161><s%> they that <S%G2525>conducted<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> <S%G116>Athens:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>receiving<s%> a <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> for to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with all <S%G5613>speed,<s%> <S%G5033><s%> they <S%G1826>departed.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> while <S%G3972>Paul<s%> waited <S%G1551>for<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G116>Athens,<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> was <S%G3947>stirred<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> when he <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> wholly given to <S%G2712>idolatry.<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1256>disputed<s%> <S%G3303>he<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> devout <S%G4576>persons,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> them that met <S%G3909>with<s%> him.

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5386>philosophers<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1946>Epicureans,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4770>Stoics,<s%> <S%G4820>encountered<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4691>babbler<s%> <S%G3004>say?<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>other<s%> some, He <S%G1380>seemeth<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> a setter <S%G2604>forth<s%> of <S%G3581>strange<s%> <S%G1140>gods:<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2097>preached<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> they <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G697>Areopagus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1410>May<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine,<s%> <S%G3588>whereof<s%> <S%G4675>thou<s%> <S%G2980>speakest,<s%> is?

For <S%G1063><s%> thou <S%G1533>bringest<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> strange <S%G3579>things<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G189>ears:<s%> we <S%G1014>would<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2309>mean.<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G1511><s%>

(For <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G117>Athenians<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> which were <S%G1927>there<s%> spent their <S%G2119>time<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2087>else,<s%> <S%G2228>but<s%> either to <S%G3004>tell,<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> new <S%G2537>thing.)<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of Mars' <S%G697>hill,<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> Ye <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G117>Athens,<s%> I <S%G2334>perceive<s%> that <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G5613>are<s%> too <S%G1174>superstitious.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as I passed <S%G1330>by,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G333>beheld<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4574>devotions,<s%> I <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2532>an<s%> <S%G1041>altar<s%> with this <S%G1722>inscription,<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1924><s%> TO THE <S%G57>UNKNOWN<s%> <S%G2316>GOD.<s%> <S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> ye <S%G50>ignorantly<s%> <S%G2151>worship,<s%> <S%G5126>him<s%> <S%G2605>declare<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> unto <S%G5213>you.<s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>therein,<s%> <S%G846><s%> seeing that <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G5225>is<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2730>dwelleth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3485>temples<s%> made with <S%G5499>hands;<s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> is <S%G2323>worshiped<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> <S%G444>men's<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> as though he <S%G4326>needed<s%> any <S%G5100>thing,<s%> seeing <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4157>breath,<s%> and all <S%G2596>things;<s%> <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> hath <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> for to <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and hath <S%G3724>determined<s%> the <S%G2540>times<s%> before <S%G4384>appointed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3734>bounds<s%> of <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2733>habitation;<s%>

That they should <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>haply<s%> <S%G1065><s%> they might feel <S%G5584>after<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> him, <S%G2544>though<s%> he <S%G5225>be<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of us: <S%G2257><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> we <S%G2198>live,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2795>move,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have our <S%G2070>being;<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of your <S%G2596>own<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G4163>poets<s%> have <S%G2046>said,<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5120>his<s%> <S%G1085>offspring.<s%>

Forasmuch <S%G3767>then<s%> as we <S%G5225>are<s%> the <S%G1085>offspring<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> we <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G3543>think<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2304>Godhead<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> like <S%G3664>unto<s%> <S%G5557>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G696>silver,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%> <S%G5480>graven<s%> by <S%G5078>art<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G1761>device.<s%>

And <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> of this <S%G52>ignorance<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5237>winked<s%> at; but <S%G3569>now<s%> <S%G3853>commandeth<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> every <S%G3837>where<s%> to repent: <S%G3340><s%>

Because <S%G1360><s%> he hath <S%G2476>appointed<s%> a <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> that <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he hath <S%G3724>ordained;<s%> whereof he hath <S%G3930>given<s%> <S%G4102>assurance<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> men, in that he hath <S%G450>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G5512>mocked:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>others<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> We will <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> matter.
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2853>cleaved<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believed:<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1354>Dionysius<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G698>Areopagite,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1152>Damaris,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
